CUSTOM_DND5E.clientSettings.label: Client Settings
CUSTOM_DND5E.clientSettings.note: These settings only affect the current user and are configurable by each user.
CUSTOM_DND5E.label: Label
CUSTOM_DND5E.weightModifiers.label: Weight Modifiers
CUSTOM_DND5E.weightModifiers.note.1: These settings do not stack. The lower modifier will be used where multiple modifiers apply to an item.
CUSTOM_DND5E.weightModifiers.note.2: 0 will reduce an item's weight by 100%, 0.5 will reduce an item's weight by 50%, 1.25 will increase an item's weight by 25%
CUSTOM_DND5E.weightModifiers.note.3: Warning: The module 'Variant Encumbrance Dnd5e' is present and active the following settings will be override from this module
CUSTOM_DND5E.worldSettings.label: World Settings
CUSTOM_DND5E.worldSettings.note: These settings affect all users and are only configurable by the GM.
CUSTOM_DND5E.dialog.delete.content: This will also delete the item from all actors. Do you wish to continue?
CUSTOM_DND5E.dialog.delete.title: Delete Item
CUSTOM_DND5E.dialog.levelUpHitPointsRero: When rolling for Hit Points, if the first roll is below {minimumValue}, the die will automatically re-roll once, taking the second result.
When rolling for Hit Points, the die will re-roll until the result is at least {minimumValue}.
CUSTOM_DND5E.dialog.reset.content: This will reset everything back to the system configuration. Do you wish to continue?
CUSTOM_DND5E.dialog.reset.title: Reset Configuration

CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.autoFadeSheet.no: Automatically fade out the sheet when it is not hovered over
Press CTRL to keep the faded view while moving onto the sheet, and press CTRL to keep the full view while moving off the sheet.
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.autoMinimiseShee: Automatically minimise the sheet when it is not hovered over
Press CTRL to keep the minimized view while moving onto the sheet, and press CTRL to keep the maximized view while moving off the sheet.
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.bannerImage.note: Select an image to use as the banner on the character sheet
Recommended image size is 800px by 170px. Leave blank to use the default
Change the scale of the new character sheet

CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.showDeathSaves.n: Show death saves tracking on the character sheet

CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.showExhaustion.n: Show exhaustion tracking on the character sheet

CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.showLegendaryAct: Show Legendary Actions on the NPC sheet
